title: Pressure cooker lentil and split pea soup
ingredients: ['200g red lentils', '200g yellow split peas', '1 large onion, coarsely chopped', '2 carrots, coarsely chopped', '5 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2L chicken stock', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon lemon juice, or to taste']
